socketedItems.secDescrText: Draws out your own blood to power a buff for a duration, letting this skill inflict the Corrupting Blood debuff on enemies you hit, dealing physical damage over time for a short secondary duration. Base duration is 6.00 seconds

You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
